Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: "From that day on, the girl named A frequently appears in Iris's letters."}
{3: "Through those letters, you can feel Iris's joy at finding a best friend."}
{3: 'The days go by and through the descriptions in the letters, the other girl starts to take shape.'}

{3: 'From time to time, she and Iris would have a huge fight over some minute differences in ideas. Yet, the next moment, they would spend all day and night deep in discussion because they found new common ground.'}
{3: 'To think that in a world like this, there are people who are bothered by things like this.'}
{3: 'While thinking about how inconceivable this is, you also feel a subtle sense of gratification.'}
{3: "It's like seeing flowers blooming in a briar of thorns. It's heartwarming."}
{3: 'It does not know what a tempest is, nor does it need to know.'}
{3: "Knowing that they're both doing well is enough for you."}
{3: 'Both Iris and A have been getting busier.'}
{3: 'They are pursuing their own ideals, working to forge their own path in these unforgiving times.'}
{1: "It's been awhile since my last letter to you, 【kuroname】.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Please forgive my recent lack of correspondence. It's just that after things starting falling in place, I haven't had much time to myself.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The World Government Association of Art contacted me recently, telling me they really love my operas.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "They're giving me an opportunity to have my play performed in the Grand Opera House of Babylonia.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "As such, I've been spending my days and nights making preparations.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Writing the libretto, composing the music... I've decided to base it on the Acadia Evacuation.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "A is helping me as well, of course. Every day, we discuss how to set up the scenery so that everything's perfect.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I've gained enough experience and I've never doubted my own talent. I have absolute confidence in myself.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "But for some reason that I can't explain, I'm panicking.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'My audience is growing larger, cheering for me and supporting my operas.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But this panic feels like quicksand, pulling me deeper and deeper in.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't know why I'm panicking. I've pondered over it for a long time, but I don't know what it is that I'm missing.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't dare to unload this on A. She's busy concentrating on her own art and I can't disturb her at this time.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'In the past, when I gazed up at the stars in the sky, all I saw was unparalleled beauty.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But now, when I gaze up at those same stars, all I feel is an unbearable emptiness.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'My opera will be performed the day after tomorrow, and yet here I am, cowering.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I feel so lost, and so I write to you for help.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'This is incredibly selfish of me. How could I be so mean as to heap my problems on you?', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "But I trust you, unconditionally. You've always been so strong. You've always managed to get me back on track.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Please tell me, 【kuroname】，what is it that I'm missing?", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'There is an opera ticket attached to the letter. If you can make it, please come and see my show.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I had hoped that our first meeting wouldn't be under such dire circumstances, but alas, it's unavoidable.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I want to—', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'The following sentence repeats several times.'}
{3: 'Written down, then erased; written down, then erased again; written down, then erased once more.'}
{3: 'Her hesitation and urgency are only veiled with a sheet of paper.'}
{3: 'All of the contradiction eventually boiled down to a desperate plea for help.'}
{1: 'I want to see you, 【kuroname】.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '2.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: '(Remove ticket)', 3: '45'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory265.png'}
{3: 'But it backfired.'}
{3: 'Follow-up missions and lengthy combat exercises have kept you busy every day. You do not even have the time and opportunity to check your mail, let alone attend a date.'}
{3: 'Another month passes in the blink of an eye.'}
{3: 'You open your mailbox to find it stuffed full of letters.'}
{3: 'They are all from Iris.'}
{3: 'You open each one, carefully reading through them.'}
{1: "You weren't in my audience. I'm pretty sure of that.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Because even though we've never met, I'm sure I can recognize your face at a glance.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I had been waiting for you, but I didn't see you even when the performance ended. I guess you didn't have time. I believe you didn't have time.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "You're a soldier, so it must have been something that you had no say in—That's what I tell myself.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Although I must admit I was dismayed, I'm really glad you didn't come to see the opera.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "It was such a novice attempt, so much so that I wouldn't feel comfortable showing it to you. Had you seen it, you would have been disappointed in me.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'After the performance ended, I found the reason for my panic.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '"Using the libretto and music to convey your inner world to others... I feel that it\'s an especially meaningful endeavor."', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I seem to have written this in one of my previous letters, didn't I?", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I've been in such a hurry that I ended up becoming the type of person I used to dislike.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Along the way, I'd somehow lost sight of my ideals and my dreams.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'd stopped examining every libretto I wrote and my arrogance hurt others. This pains me.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'A long time ago, I felt that Babylonia was such a small place.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'So much so that sending letters never took more than a day.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Now more than ever, I realize why it's so small.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "It comes across as comfortable and cozy because I've been a frog in a well.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'From my limited perspective, I depicted a ridiculous representation of the world and actually thought it was the real thing.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "If I want to capture the real world on canvas and create real art, I shouldn't stay here.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '"Only the experience of hell can exercise the power to create heaven, only through the blood of the fingers can the world pop into existence."', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Someone once said that.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I strongly believe this, and so I've made the biggest decision of my life.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'I wish you could be physically here with me and listen to me telling you this. And then, just as always, tell me what I should do.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "But this time, I can't wait any longer. This is my decision and my responsibility to bear. I can't push them to you.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Waiting is no longer a pleasant experience, but a torture.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}

{1: '"Do not linger to gather flowers to keep them, but walk on, for flowers will keep themselves blooming all your way."', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'You once told me that.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'm moving forward, 【kuroname】.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Perhaps this will be the last letter.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "If this isn't, well, the next time I send you a letter, I'll be a brand new me.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I believe there will be a day when we will meet. That I'm sure.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I've attached a pen with this letter. That's the pen I've been using all this while.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I've clutched it all day and night, contemplating how best to write you this letter.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "When you use it, it'll be as if I was holding your hand close to my heart.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Yours faithfully,', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Iris', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'This letter is like a final farewell.'}
{3: 'Almost immediately, you pick up her pen and begin to write a reply.'}
{1: 'Iris:', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Art is the gentlest way of safeguarding the human soul.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'You might doubt yourself now,', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "but don't turn your back to everything.", 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Being able to enduring this hardship,', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'has made you all the more radiant.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'We will meet someday.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
